description:
Oda Nobunaga is reborn as a Shiba-inu in the modern world. One day, at the park, he runs into his former acquaintances and rivals – all of whom have also been reincarnated as dogs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jikuu o Koete Yomigaetta Otoko: Washi ga Oda Shinamon Nobunaga de Aru!?
Man from the Past: I Am Oda Cinnamon Nobunaga!?
رجل من الماضي: أنا أودا سينامون نوبوناغا؟!
時空を越えて蘇った漢[おとこ] ワシが織田シナモン信長である!?
